perturbation.explanation: Moving the Warranty clause from the Products Purchase and Sale section to the Miscellaneous section, making it less prominent and harder to find. This can affect the customer's ability to make warranty claims because they might not be able to easily find or understand their warranty rights.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Uniform Commercial Code (UCC) - Implied Warranty of Merchantability

perturbation.original_text: 5.6. Governing Law; Jurisdiction. This Agreement and all related business transactions will be governed by the laws of the Commonwealth of Massachusetts (without reference to principles of conflicts or choice of law which would cause the application of the internal laws of any other jurisdiction). The courts of or in the Commonwealth of Massachusetts will have nonexclusive jurisdiction over any disputes hereunder. Service of any action or proceeding in any such courts by either party may be made upon the other by registered mail, return receipt requested, at its address given herein.
perturbation.changed_text: 3.8. Governing Law; Jurisdiction. This Agreement and all related business transactions will be governed by the laws of the Commonwealth of Massachusetts (without reference to principles of conflicts or choice of law which would cause the application of the internal laws of any other jurisdiction). The courts of or in the Commonwealth of Massachusetts will have nonexclusive jurisdiction over any disputes hereunder. Service of any action or proceeding in any such courts by either party may be made upon the other by registered mail, return receipt requested, at its address given herein.
perturbation.explanation: Relocating Governing Law and Jurisdiction to Covenants from Miscellaneous can cause confusion to which laws are applied in certain breaches and affect the enforceability of the entire document because Governing Law and Jurisdiction dictates which court has power over the parties. It is an essential clause in the document.
perturbation.contradicted_law: General Contract Law - Choice of Law and Forum Selection

perturbation.explanation: Relocating Effect of Termination to Appointment and Acceptance from Term and Termination can cause confusion with the termination of the agreement and its terms. Parties are more likely to miss or not understand the terms of the contract termination and it can lead to disagreements and/or legal issues.
